name: Patriarch
overview:
Patriarch is a leading private equity organization, a US based company that oversees entities and responsible for starting new Patriarch companies. Patriarch is also responsible for executing new innovations with consumer and B2B Internet assets.

Started in 2006 by Eric Schiffer, Patriarch has gone on to grow businesses in sectors ranging from technology, software, Interactive media, media, and ecommerce. Patriarch means quality, innovation, fun and a sense of constant improvement.
